// Pivot 0, 0
int bar_idle[16] = {
	0, 7,
	4, 1,
	9, 1,
	14, 7,
	14, 33,
	10, 37,
	4, 37,
	0, 32
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float bar_idle[16] = {
	0.000000f, 0.184211f,
	0.285714f, 0.026316f,
	0.642857f, 0.026316f,
	1.000000f, 0.184211f,
	1.000000f, 0.868421f,
	0.714286f, 0.973684f,
	0.285714f, 0.973684f,
	0.000000f, 0.842105f
};
